== Nuvem (CT) (626924) ==

Nuvem (CT) is a town in the [[SALCETE 002]] taluka of [[SOUTH GOA]] district with an area of 11 sq. km. and harbouring 2248 households with total population of 9288 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 5 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 4450 and female population is 4838. Scheduled Caste population is 45 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3634. Census Location Code of the town is 626924<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 188 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 506 km. Railway station is at MARGAO at a distance of 4 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 1100 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MARGAO (4 km) .
